name: European Association of Agrochemical Companies
goal: The EAACC seeks to establish an open and transparent European market for high-quality and safe plant protection products. The association calls for compulsory, regular chemical analyses of all plant protection products, the abolition of the common origin concept, the free choice of packaging and a pan-European registration of plant protection products.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Environment, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
